headline: MV PRODUCTS SINGLE STAGE VACUUM TRAP, POSI-TRAP, 8"
description: Single Stage Vacuum Inlet Trap - 8" - Straight Through      You may also be interested in the following Mass-Vac filter elements that we have in stock:    300905 Copper Gauze Filter Element   300915 Stainless Steel Gauze Filter Element   300935 Sodasorb® Filter Element    400935 PolyPro 5µm Filter Element   400975 PolyPro 2µm Filter Element
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pump Accessories
specstable:
Manufacturer MV Products
Model POSI-TRAP - 8"
Description Single Stage Vacuum Inlet Trap, 8" - KF 40
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Other Information

The flow of the effluent gas is directed through the inlet port to the filter elements. The filter elements of the POSI-TRAP®
are sealed at both the inlet and the exhaust ends, eliminating blow-by and maintaining a positive flow through the elements.
This means all contaminants must pass through the filter medium.

Extended Description Details at Mass-Vac Inc Posi-Trap and Filter Elements.pdf
